intro: Podosciadium californicum, commonly known as the California sand verbena, is a flowering plant native to the western United States. It has a low-growing habit with slender stems and narrow, lance-shaped leaves. Podosciadium californicum is often found in coastal areas and is adapted to arid or semi-arid conditions.
